dao.name: qry_sales_class_hs
dao.statement: SELECT CLASS_COD, BEGIN_DAT,END_DAT, INS_DAT, INS_USR, UPD_DAT, UPD_USR FROM SALES_CLASS_HS WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND trim(SALES_COD) = trim(:sales_cod) ORDER BY END_DAT DESC

dao.name: qry_last_sales_class_hs
dao.statement: SELECT CLASS_COD, BEGIN_DAT,END_DAT, INS_DAT, INS_USR, UPD_DAT, UPD_USR FROM SALES_CLASS_HS WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND trim(SALES_COD) = trim(:sales_cod) AND rownum<=1 ORDER BY END_DAT DESC
